turn.4: "Hedgehog in the Fog" was ranked in a poll at the 2003 Laputa Animation Festival where 140 animators from around the world voted for the best animated films of all time.
turn.5: Did it win any other awards?
turn.6: Since January 2009 the main character (the Hedgehog) from the movie has a statue in the city center of the capital of Ukraine, Kiev.
turn.7: Was it shown in any other countries?
turn.8: The film was spoofed in the third episode of the eighth season of the animated comedy series "Family Guy", "Spies Reminiscent of Us", in 2009.

turn.10: The opening ceremonies for the 2014 Winter Olympics referenced this work, mentioning it in a list of signature Russian accomplishments and artists, including Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Leo Tolstoy, and Sputnik.
